long_description: When saving weight is critical to your mission, choose the Marmot Minimalist jacket. It's made with Gore-Tex(R) PacLite(R) and weighs a mere 15 oz. 2.5-layer Gore-Tex PacLite is engineered specifically to be light, packable and more breathable than other 2- or 3-layer Gore-Tex fabrics. Lack of need for a separate lining allows fabric to be light and compact; combines durable wind- and waterproofness with exceptional breathability. Micro seam allowances increase breathability and suppleness, and save weight; all seams are sealed for complete protection. Laminated, mini stormflap protects front zipper; chin guard protects from zipper abrasion. Pit zippers allow built-up body moisture to escape. Adjustable hood, drawcord hem and asymmetric rip-and-stick adjustable cuffs add protection. Marmot Minimalist jacket features Angel-Wing(TM) Movement construction for unhindered range of motion.
